# How to Use This Book {.unnumbered}

This book is available in **HTML**, **PDF**, and **EPUB** formats.  
Each chapter includes:

- Clear conceptual explanations  
- Mathematical foundations  
- Worked-out examples  
- Executable code  
- Applied projects that build cumulatively  

The HTML version is the most interactive, while PDF and EPUB provide  
portable reference formats.
